properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 b1 c2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the source of life
I can't be left behind
No one else will do
I will take hold of You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My heart is Yours for life
I need Your hand in mine
No one else will do
Lord I put my trust in You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I need You Jesus
To come to my rescue
Where else can I go?
There's no other Name by
Which I am saved
Capture me with grace
I will follow You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I will follow You
This world has nothing for me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
There's no other Name by
Which I am saved
Capture me with grace (3x)
I will follow You
I will follow You
